overview:
Ronni Zehavi is CEO and co-founder of Cotendo, he is a experienced executive with over fifteen years experience in multi-national high-technology companies.

Prior to Cotendo, Zehavi most recently was VP of international business development and sales for Commtouch, for six years. Prior roles at Commtouch includes VP of Operations and HR. Previous ventures include co-founding software company Shemer - Auto Arbitrage Ltd., who developed and commercialized a software expert system for automated derivatives trading. Zehavi has a BA in educational management and History from Tel Aviv University, and a MA in Organizational Sociology from Bar-Ilan University.
